name: Mock
description:
Quickly and easily fill text fields with customizable sample content.


Mock intelligently groups text fields, so you don't have to waste time selecting only the fields you want to edit. Select anything - an entire screen, a frame, a set of fields - and Mock will let you choose which group to paste into.


You can paste from predefined data like names, addresses, numbers, and dates - or find or create your own lists online and link to those from inside the plugin.
